title: Stylish Podgorica City Escape Overlooking Sitnica River
description: On the bank of the river Sitnica, discover the capital city of Montenegro, Roman ruins, and the medieval Medun with an escape to voco Podgorica, an IHG Hotel. There’s no better base to explore this once Ottoman Turkish town’s eclectic galleries, try traditional Balkan fare from a local cafe or wander the verdant parklands than this centrally located hotel. After a day of adventures, delve into bliss at the onsite spa or order a cocktail in the lobby bar before venturing into the nightlife.
